txt.en: Gadda and Tatwine have set up their new free settlement on the farmstead where you planted seeds not long ago.

'Do you see, [placeholder]? I have freed myself from Stangard, and now your efforts will not have been in vain.

'I am a farmer in my heart, and this is where I belong. I do not know if I will ever return to Stangard, but men in Eorlsmead who want for food need only ask. It has been far too long since crops were grown in these stark lands.

'Would you care to tend the farm for a while? I find it very tranquil work.'

Tatwine, happy with his new position as a free man maintaining the farming work you started, has invited you to join him in his maintenance of the farm.\n\nYou should help Tatwine with the farm chores.
'I cannot thank you enough for inspiring me to do this, [placeholder]. No matter what the consequences for my leaving Stangard, I believe that this is right. What you did for us... was right.'
Tatwine is tending the fields at the abandoned farm.\n\nYou should return to Tatwine with the goods you gathered.
Harvest the crops from the seeds you planted ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
